body: 难得的近亲兄妹，回魂后能不能怀孕啊（悄声）
mf got the niki slippers 💀💀💀💀💀 (vine boom x5) (AUUUGHHH by garrison)
he，lets goooo!
@gosick1586 thanks for the summary, this was pretty sad.
好感動，還可以繼續真是太好了
這本太讚了吧，劇情真的很讓人想一直看下去，最後很感人，色色的地方也很棒，衛生紙都不知道拿來擦眼淚還是....
@gosick1586   ... thanks for the cake... I fucking have myself now
spoiler ahead and yes that is not a short summary. The cake is a lie!
plot twist, god has no idea what he is doing and the little sister is still here after the do do makey makey. And now they live together in the apartment forever and ever. migoto migoto.

After that happened, there is no turning back. And she goes guns blazing with him. He obviously turns her down since you know, she is his blood-related little sister, and he is sane. However dissatisfy, she use her almighty ghost power to freeze him up and do the do while telling him how much she ~~like~~ LOVE him, and how painful if was for the society to reject incest. And that it was relieving that she was dead. Before her confession, the mc was really against having sex, but after hearing her side of the story, he gave in. Who knew all that time she was struggling with suicide while trying to distance herself from the one she loved and holds dear to so much. He said sorry to their parents for committing a Habsburg and dig right in. Satisfy the lit sis last wish and see her goodbye.

@keith521 she is really dead. But anyway let's pick up where I left off. He found her sleeping half-naked. The two then started to live together, he would go do the grocery, and lit sis would cook for him. Eventually, mc is walking away from depression and becomes more and more cheerful. The situation improved so much that his friends are wondering if he got a girlfriend. However, this equilibrium wouldn't last long. One day mc comes back to his apartment earlier due to his class canceling, and he decided to buy her a strawberry shortcake, which is something she loved when she was still alive. Oh yeah did I forget to mention, that even though she turns into a ghost, and possesses ghost power, she also has a physical body, really handy when you need to do the do, however her soul will leave her body the moment she leaves the apartment. Anyway, the moment before he was about to surprise her, he hear her moaning BIG BROTHER, hard.
This is good
@gosick1586 what? really?? anyway good shiet
這故事太令人悲傷了，妹妹對哥哥的愛卻只有死亡後才能修成正果
@gosick1586 wait so is she really dead or it's just a ghost?

Here is a quick summary: the little sister is a brocon, but when she enter junior high, she realized incest isn’t socially acceptable. So her relationship with her brother grew cold. One day, she got into an accident with a drunk driver and was killed. Ever since that happened his brother is in a distressing mood, and he moved away from the house once he is in college to forget about her, but he is still hurt every time someone mentioned the word little sister. One day when he come back to his apartment, he saw he light is lit. And there he discovered his little sister sleeping on the couch half naked

好讚幹，這本是甚麼鬼
家人對自己抱持著不同的態度，迷茫以及無措，自身的慾望與倫理的碰撞，還有現實跟回憶的交疊，含著淚水射了，好愛...
希望後續哥哥能夠被掰成愛妹妹的，雖然感覺那樣妹妹就會升天，所以還是別了...想要看更多哥哥跟妹妹的生活喔喔喔喔喔
泪，射了出来…呜呜呜呜呜呜呜
只好把衛生紙拿來擦眼淚了
I cried, what a good story
